payload.label: myTube
payload.description: myTube was built with one goal in mind to provide the most fluid and feature-rich YouTube experience on Windows 8. Designed to feel like a native part of the OS, it prioritizes speed, elegant transitions, and a clean interface that puts the content first.

payload.label: angryBirdsSpace
payload.description: The #1 mobile game of all time blasts off into orbit! After a giant claw kidnaps their eggs, the Angry Birds chase it into a wormhole and find themselves floating in a strange new galaxy—surrounded by space pigs! Angry Birds Space takes the physics-based gameplay you love and adds a cosmic twist that changes everything.

payload.label: adobePhotoshop
payload.description: The world’s most advanced digital imaging software, now optimized for the next generation of hardware. Whether you are a professional photographer or a digital artist, Adobe Photoshop on Windows 8 brings you closer to your pixels than ever before. With support for high-DPI displays and intuitive touch gestures, your canvas is now more responsive and immersive.

payload.label: msMinesweeper
payload.description: The world’s most iconic puzzle game has evolved Microsoft Minesweeper for Windows 8 takes the legendary gameplay you know and love and transforms it into a modern, immersive experience. With updated graphics, new game modes, and full integration with your Xbox account, the hunt for mines has never been more exciting.

payload.label: tortasypostres
payload.description: Bring the sweetness home Tortas y Postres is a beautifully designed Windows 8 application dedicated to the world of fine cakes and desserts. Designed with the modern Metro interface in mind, it offers a visual feast of recipes that look stunning on both tablets and desktop PCs.

payload.label: openTracks
payload.description: OpenTracks is a versatile, community-focused application designed to bring modern functionality and open-source freedom to the Windows 8 Metro environment. Whether you are tracking your latest outdoor adventure or streaming your favorite independent music.

payload.label: cutTheRope
payload.description: A mysterious package has arrived, and the little monster inside has only one request… CANDY! Cut the Rope is the award-winning physics-based puzzle game that took the world by storm, now fully optimized for the Windows 8 experience. Combine outstanding physics, tricky levels, and bright visuals to guide the candy into Om Nom’s mouth. But be careful—collecting the three gold stars in each level is where the real challenge begins!

payload.label: deezer
payload.description: Discover your next favorite song with Deezer! Deezer for Windows 8 brings over 20 million tracks (and counting!) to your fingertips with a sleek, fluid interface designed specifically for the modern era of Windows. Combining professional editorial curation with smart algorithms, Deezer ensures that your music is as unique as you are.

payload.label: networkSpeedTest
payload.description: Network Speed Test is a clean, ad-free, and highly accurate utility designed to help you understand your internet performance. Whether you are troubleshooting a slow Wi-Fi connection or testing your new 4G LTE data speeds on a Windows 8 PC, this app provides the data you need in seconds.

payload.label: whereismyWhater
payload.description: Help Swampy the Alligator get his shower! Deep beneath the city, Swampy just wants to be clean, but the other alligators are out to sabotage his water supply. Where’s My Water? is a challenging, physics-based puzzler that requires quick thinking and clever strategy. Use your screen to carve through dirt and guide fresh water, purple ooze, and steam to help Swampy and his friends.

payload.label: kindle
payload.description: Carry thousands of books in the palm of your hand. The Kindle app is reimagined for Windows 8, providing a beautiful, easy-to-use interface that turns your tablet or PC into a powerful e-reader. Whether you are catching up on a bestseller during your commute or studying a textbook at your desk, Kindle for Windows 8 offers a seamless and immersive reading experience.

payload.label: fruitNinja
payload.description: The slicer is back and sharper than ever! Fruit Ninja brings the addictive, high-energy action of the world’s most famous fruit-slicing game to the Windows 8 ecosystem. Whether you’re a master sensei or a newcomer to the dojo, Fruit Ninja provides a satisfying blend of simple mechanics and deep, skill-based challenges that are perfect for any device.

payload.label: netflix
payload.description: The world’s leading subscription service for movies and TV shows comes to the Start Screen. The Netflix app for Windows 8 has been built from the ground up to take full advantage of the modern Metro design. It offers a fast, fluid, and immersive way to discover and watch your favorite content—whether you are on a touch-screen tablet or a traditional desktop PC.

payload.label: dumbwaystodie2thegames
payload.description: The world’s dumbest characters are back, and they’ve gathered for an even bigger, dumber game! Following the viral success of the original campaign, Dumb Ways to Die 2: The Games brings a massive set of new, action-packed mini-games to your Windows 8 device. Train safety has never been this hilariously dangerous.

payload.label: evernote
payload.description: Your second brain, beautifully organized.Evernote for Windows 8 is more than just a note-taking app; it is a powerful workspace designed to help you capture, nurture, and share your ideas. Reimagined for the modern interface, Evernote combines the stability of its world-class syncing with a fluid, Metro inspired design that makes staying productive feel effortless.

payload.label: raymanJungleRun
payload.description: The legendary platforming hero makes his grand debut on Windows 8! Powered by the same gorgeous UbiArt Framework engine used in Rayman Origins, Rayman Jungle Run brings breathtaking visuals and rhythm-based action to your screen. Sprint through the lush landscapes of the Glade of Dreams in a high-speed adventure that is easy for anyone to pick up, but a true challenge to master.
